sentences.en: A complete tenement block was burnt to the ground.
sentences.cn: 整幢公寓大楼被付之一炬。

sentences.en: A fallen tree is blocking the road.
sentences.cn: 一棵倒下的树把路阻断了。

sentences.en: a major block to progress
sentences.cn: 进步的重大阻碍

sentences.en: a wall made of concrete blocks
sentences.cn: 由混凝土块砌成的墙

sentences.en: Block draughts around doors and windows.
sentences.cn: 挡住门窗处的穿堂风。

sentences.en: he blocked in Vera's Mini.
sentences.cn: 他停车的位置堵住了韦拉的宝马Mini轿车。

sentences.en: He walked around the block three times.
sentences.cn: 他绕着这个街区转了3圈。

sentences.en: Head for 44th Street, a few blocks east of Sixth Avenue.
sentences.cn: 往44号街走，从第六大街往东走几个街区就是。

sentences.en: I finally hoisted him up with a block and tackle.
sentences.cn: 我最终用滑轮组把他拉了上去。

sentences.en: I had to block the thought out of my mind.
sentences.cn: 我得把这种想法抛到脑后。

sentences.en: It started a fire in a block of flats.
sentences.cn: 大火是从一幢公寓大楼烧起的。

sentences.en: it's a good idea to block in regular periods of exercise.
sentences.cn: 安排固定的锻炼时间是个好主意。

sentences.en: laws designed to block imports of cheap tobacco
sentences.cn: 旨在阻挠廉价烟草进口的法规

sentences.en: Pitt planted tall trees outside his home to block rubberneckers.
sentences.cn: 皮特在他家外面种上了高大的树以阻止人们窥探。

sentences.en: Please fill out the form in block capitals.
sentences.cn: 请用正体大写字母填写表格。

sentences.en: Senator Seymour has threatened a filibuster to block the bill.
sentences.cn: 参议员西摩威胁说要发表长篇演说来阻挠议案通过。

sentences.en: She lives in a tower block on an estate in London.
sentences.cn: 她住在伦敦某住宅区的一栋高楼里。

sentences.en: Someone had hollowed out a large block of stone.
sentences.cn: 有人把一大块石头给凿空了。

sentences.en: The block becomes magnetic when the current is switched on.
sentences.cn: 一通上电流，这块板就会有磁性。

sentences.en: The church is down the block.
sentences.cn: 教堂就在这个街区那头。

sentences.en: The company has in the past been slow out of the blocks to adapt to consumer tastes.
sentences.cn: 公司从一开始就适应了顾客的口味

sentences.en: the original first manuscript for Ravel's &I{Bolero} goes on the block today.
sentences.cn: 拉威尔的《波莱罗》始手原稿定于今天拍卖。

sentences.en: The Senate blocked publication of the report.
sentences.cn: 参议院阻止这个报告发表。

sentences.en: The shelves were chock-a-block with ornaments.
sentences.cn: 架子上堆满了装饰品。

sentences.en: The sink’s blocked up.
sentences.cn: 水槽堵住了。

sentences.en: The small roads are chock-a-block with traffic.
sentences.cn: 条条小路全挤满了车马行人。

sentences.en: Those booking a block of seats get them at reduced rates.
sentences.cn: 团体订座可享受折扣价。

sentences.en: you're blocking out my sun.
sentences.cn: 你把我的阳光给挡住了。

words.tran_cn: 块状的；短而结实的；浓淡不均匀的
成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的

phrases.tran_cn: 程序块结构，分程序结构；方块图
n. 积木；构件，基础材料
混凝土砌块；混凝土砖；混凝土趸；水泥砖
断块；故障闭塞；断裂地块

phrases.phrase: have been around the block (a few times)
phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)见多识广，经验丰富
开始：比赛或竞赛从起点开始

phrases.phrase: put (或 lay) one's head (或 neck) on the block
the new kid on the block
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)新来的人，新成员，新手

trans.tran_cn: 成批的，大块的；交通堵塞的
一块，一批，立方体，大楼，街区，一片土地，障碍（物），拦截
trans.tran_en: the distance along a city street from where one street crosses it to the next
to stop something happening, developing, or succeeding

trans.tran_cn: 阻塞， 拦阻； 封锁
trans.tran_en: to prevent anything moving through a space by being or placing something across it or in it
